problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=AC,M、N分别是AB、AC的中点,D、E为BC上的点,连接DN、EM,若AB=13cm,BC=10cm,DE=5cm,则阴影部分的面积()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = AC, M and N are the midpoints of AB and AC respectively, D and E are points on BC, connect DN and EM, if AB = N_0, BC = N_1, DE = N_2 , Then the area of ​​the shaded part ()
raw_answer: 解:连接MN,则MN是△ABC的中位线,因此MN=\frac{1}{2}BC=5cm；过点A作AF⊥BC于F,则AF=√{13^{2}-5^{2}}=12cm．∵图中阴影部分的三个三角形的底长都是5cm,且高的和为12cm；∴S~阴影~=\frac{1}{2}×5×12=30cm^2^．故选:D．
